set(OPTIONAL_LITE_PROJECT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/optional-lite")

UpdateExternalLib("optional-lite" "https://github.com/martinmoene/optional-lite.git" "5e8a82ac029aebfd2f5708f183a00eda2be132cc")
